gist.headline: New bot on the block
gist.blurb: Say hello to ppo, a powerful new AI assistant by AnesNT, now powered by Pollinations.
gist.summary: Added ppo to the community apps directory, expanding the ecosystem of tools built on our infrastructure.
gist.impact: Users can now access this powerful AI assistant directly from the apps list.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee welcoming a new robot friend (ppo) to the garden. ppo represents the new app - a helpful assistant.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot shaking hands with a sleek new pixel robot assistant in a lime green (#ecf874) garden. Soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'NEW FRIEND'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
